collection_holder_name: Walter J. Brown Media Archives & Peabody Awards Collection
pageContext.collection_description: Recordings produced by this UGA station from 1973-2003 on 1/4 inch open reel and cartridges (carts).  This collection contains approximately 2000 1/4 inch open reels and cartridges (or carts) from the University of Georgia student run radio station WUOG. The recordings run from 1973 until approximately 2003 and contain original programs and recordings. The station began broadcasting on October 16, 1972 with a 3,200 watt signal and grew to 10,000 watts by 1977. As of 1994 the station has 26,000 watts making one of the strongest signals for a student run station in the country.
